name: Space Rocket Ride
description:
Take a ride in your spaceship! You will be a brave astronaut, who is on the way to discover a new place for mankind in the universe.

Fly from planet to planet by simply tapping the screen. The smaller the planet the more points you get and points are also awarded for distance travelled. Keep an eye on you fuel but don’t worry we have coded it so it drops between 2 planets so its always accessible.
Planets will start to disappear making it harder the longer you survive.
Its a never ending game made harder by increasing speed and fewer planets.

A great pick up and play game especially for children which will test their reaction and attentiveness, as well as help to improve their hand-eye coordination.

Simple fun games are always the best and this is one of the best we made.

Good luck and have fun!


Features
- Simple one-touch gameplay
- Awesome graphic
- Cool music and sound effects
- Suitable for children
- A game never bored
- Game Center integrated so you can save and compete for top high scores.
